localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: With more meetings than ever taking place over Zoom, Skype, and other online conference platforms the need for them to look as professional as possible is a real one. Background.live is a remarkable new resource providing virtual background images for free.
nodes.title: Virtual Background Images - Free virtual background images for online meetings
nodes.author: Hannu Sehm

nodes.excerpt: Mayday is a new kind of calendar, built for busy people. It automates scheduling based on your True Availability, intelligently blocks out time to focus, and helps to optimize your week. Take control of your schedule and spend time in more meaningful ways.
nodes.title: Mayday - A calendar designed to help you spend time better
nodes.author: Jeremy Bell

nodes.excerpt: Calendly is your hub for scheduling meetings efficiently, eliminating the hassle of back-and-forth emails so you can get back to work. We uncomplicate scheduling by only offering times that work with your availability. Used by millions worldwide.
nodes.title: Calendly 2.0 - Easily schedule meetings without the back-and-forth emails
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Feedio enables product managers to centrally manage feature requests coming in from clients, and internal teams. Additionally, it allows you to make sense of what creates most value for your clients and notifies them when you ship those features.
nodes.title: Feedio - Easiest way to manage feature requests
